item.title: Biking Cape Cod
item.description: Our most salient memory of the early phase of the COVID-19 pandemic was escaping our apartment for a week of biking along Cape Cod and the nearby islands in August. Our itinerary We went out on a Sunday and spent 6 days. Our ferries made a triangle so that we could see both islands. Day Itinerary 1 Train to Hyannis, ferry to Marthaâ€™s Vineyard.
